description.narrative: (Ghana): USAID will rebuild marine fisheries stocks and catches by promoting the adoption of responsible fishing practices. Fiscal Year 2018 assistance will continue to strengthen the enabling environment for marine resource governance. USAID will improve the legal enabling framework where decision making authority is shared between government and communities, fishers, and fish processors. Assistance will be used to improve fisheries management through constituent and stakeholder engagement. USAID will conduct mass media communications campaigns in close collaboration with the Ministry of Fisheries and Aquaculture Development and the Fisheries Commission to galvanize public support and political will for responsible sector management and fishing stock sustainability. These interventions will support continued livelihood development in the fishing sector.... .
